attributes.action: Remove the petition titled "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Bring Back the anti-witchcraft laws of this country" from the petitions list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition referred to above incites hatred of those who follow one of this country's traditional spiritual practices. By allowing the petition to remain on the website the UK Government are supporting an activity that is contributing to the continued intolerance towards our indigenous religions.

rejection.details: Witchcraft is not a recognised religion.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
